'It's like they're coming out of a cult': Ukraine tackles Russian indoctrination of repatriated children
description: To date, 1,762 Ukrainian children have been repatriated after being forcibly transferred by Moscow. Ukrainians are working to de-indoctrinate them and are warning that today, all children living under occupation, Russified and militarized, are being torn from their country without even having to be physically deported.

headline: French minister says officers were 'not in line with regulations' after footage of 2023 protest revealed
description: Two media outlets published body camera footage incriminating law enforcement during an intervention against opponents of a 'megabasin' in 2023. An internal investigation has been launched.

headline: In 'Predator: Badlands,' even monsters suffer
description: The seventh installment in this franchise that began in 1987 thrusts the warrior beast onto a hostile planet where it must prove its bravery. Packed with references to science fiction films, this new entry boasts meticulously crafted action scenes.

headline: The American retirees who benefit from free French social security
description: Attracted by French universal health coverage, many Americans have chosen to settle in the country, where they are also exempt from paying income tax.

headline: War in Ukraine: Battle for Pokrovsk enters final phase
description: Russian infantry are advancing inside the city, one of the last major urban centers in the Donetsk region still under Kyiv's control. Moscow's shift in tactics – focusing on destroying Ukrainian logistics – has paid off after six months.

headline: Sudan: The UAE's shady role and Western nations' 'culpable indifference'
description: Allied with General Hemedti's Rapid Support Forces, the UAE has provided crucial logistical support to the paramilitary fighters who conducted the deadly assault on el-Fasher.
